Headline: Manager Business Development (Sales & Marketing, TIC) @ URS Certification Limited. |Ex- BDE @ Modicare India.
Comment:
Nithin Kamath Anna and Nikhil Kamath  Anna,

I kindly request you to consider encouraging pitches in Kannada as well. Countries like China and Japan use their native languages‚ÄîChinese and Japanese‚Äîfor business and idea pitching. That‚Äôs one of the reasons they are leading in technology and innovation.

Similarly, we are Kannada medium students, and we also have strong ideas. However, we often face language barriers due to English, which sometimes limits our ability to express our potential fully.

The purpose of this comment is to convey that even if the language is different, what truly matters is the strength of the idea and the product. If given an opportunity, we too can turn our ideas into paying customers.

You are doing a great job, and I sincerely respect your work. At the same time, I humbly request you to consider giving importance to Kannada pitches as well.

Thank you.
